label: 実名
説明文: The court ladies who appear in its pages do not appear under their actual names (jitsumyō). Theyare often identified by their official titles, which have been transformed and combined with the jargon of court ladies (nyōbō kotoba).#[article]Yukawa Toshiharu. Women of the Court As Soon in the Diary of the Ladies of the Imperial Bath (Oyu-dono no Ue no nikki): A Study of the Late Bunmei Era (1477-1487).
